title: How to Make an Orange Juice, Berry and Banana Smoothie

steps.headline: Chop the tops of the strawberries off.
Put the strawberries in the blender.
Put the raspberries in the blender.
Put the ice in the blender.
Put the ice cream in the blender.
Put the soy milk or milk in the blender.
Put the lid on and start it!

text: Get the blender out.  Chop the tops of the strawberries off.  Put the strawberries in the blender.  Put the raspberries in the blender.  Put the ice in the blender.  Put the ice cream in the blender.  Put the soy milk or milk in the blender.  Put the banana in.  Put the lid on and start it!  Mix until a liquid.
